channel.title: Security, Data Pipelines & Agentic SOC - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: Security Data Pipelines
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Analysis of AI-powered security solutions, market trends, and investment opportunities in enterprise cybersecurity. Exploring how AI is transforming threat detection, response, and prevention in the $150B+ security market.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
